caption: The children took some things out of the secret headquarters. During school exams, they passed the test paper to the people outside the class through the portal to help themselves answered the questions. In physical education class, Charlie wore the gloves that could enhance his strength and won the competition. They even drove the car on the road, and they were chased by the police because of overspeed. Fortunately, they escaped in the end. However, as they brought these high-tech products outside, the signal of the objects was discovered by the company.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Does it looks like real story? Or it looks like a science fiction movie?)
global.answer: No. It seems like a science fiction movie
